title: The Long Bright Dark
episode_desc: In 2012, former detective partners Rust Cohle and Martin Hart recap one of their very first cases together involving a serial killer, back in 1995.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Seeing Things
episode_desc: Cohle and Hart travel around trying to track down leads to their case. Darker sides of Hart's personal and family lives are revealed.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Locked Room
episode_desc: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Who Goes There
episode_desc: Martin is faced with marital problems. The search for Reggie Ledoux leads the detectives to a motorcycle gang called the Iron Crusaders, which Rust worked undercover in the past.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Secret Fate of All Life
episode_desc: Hart and Cohle share the spoils of a solved case; Papania and Gilbough confront the detectives with troubling new intelligence.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Haunted Houses
episode_desc: Cohle's activities in 2002, when his partnership with Hart disintegrated and he quit the force, are recalled by Maggie.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: After You've Gone
episode_desc: Cohle and Hart try to discover if a series of missing persons reports could be related to the Dora Lange murder and the Tuttle family.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Form and Void
episode_desc: An overlooked detail provides Hart and Cohle with an important new lead in their 17-year-old case.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Western Book of the Dead
episode_desc: A bizarre murder brings together three police officers and a career criminal in the corrupt city of Vinci, California.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Night Finds You
episode_desc: Ray, Ani, and Paul are assigned to Casper's murder case. Frank tries to keep his business deals going, even after Caspere's death.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Maybe Tomorrow
episode_desc: Paul works the prostitute angle; Frank receives the first casualty in a secret war.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Down Will Come
episode_desc: The detail works a pawn shop lead to close in on a suspect in the Caspere case. Frank revisits his past to pay for the present.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Other Lives
episode_desc: Ray and Frank consider new life choices; Ani and Paul go up to the coast to follow a lead.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Church in Ruins
episode_desc: Desperate to locate a missing woman with intel about Caspere, Frank meets with Mexican drug dealers; Ani infiltrates an exclusive inner circle, with Ray and Paul keeping close tabs.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Black Maps and Motel Rooms
episode_desc: As Ani, Paul, and Ray get closer to finding out the truth about Caspere, circumstances become more dangerous for them all and everyone around them. Frank deals with an inside betrayal, learns important information, and plans his next move.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Omega Station
episode_desc: Ray and Ani attempt to escape their desperate situation while Frank ties up some loose ends.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Great War and Modern Memory
episode_desc: The disappearance of a young brother and sister leads to a frantic search which will haunt one detective for the rest of his life.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Kiss Tomorrow Goodbye
episode_desc: As the search for Julie continues, the doll discovered at the crime scene provokes a reaction, while Wayne and Roland learn of a potential suspect.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Big Never
episode_desc: The search for Julie brings Wayne and Amelia together again, Wayne and Roland retrace their investigation to spot missed clues, while one White Finger resident receives a warning.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Hour and the Day
episode_desc: Wayne and Roland investigate possible connections between the local church and the Purcell crimes as tensions in West Finger reach boiling point.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: If You Have Ghosts
episode_desc: In 1980, all hell breaks loose at the home of Woodard, while in the present, Wayne and Roland reconnect after Wayne makes a discovery.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Hunters in the Dark
episode_desc: In 1990, Wayne and Roland revisit the Purcell case to uncover previously hidden or forgotten clues, while Tom looks for answers and two faces from the past resurface.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: The Final Country
episode_desc: In 1990, following an apparent suicide, the Purcell case is deemed solved, but Wayne and Roland have other ideas, which leads them to a defining course of action.
show_desc: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

title: Now Am Found
